summary: DT*:  THE CONTACT STATED WHILE THE BRAKES WERE APPLIED AT ANY SPEED, THE ABS ENGAGED.  WHEN THE VEHICLE REACHES 5 TO 10MPH, THE BRAKES MADE GROANING NOISES AND THERE WAS AN EXTENDED STOPPING DISTANCE.  THERE IS A NHTSA RECALL, 05V379000, REGARDING THE ANTI-LOCK BRAKES.  THE VIN WAS NOT INCLUDED IN THE RECALL.  THE MANUFACTURER WAS ALERTED, BUT THE VEHICLE HAS NOT BEEN INSPECTED.
